name: CUSTOM Feature #43
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign toggles_mt = section.settings.toggles_mt  
  assign toggles_mt_mobile = section.settings.toggles_mt_mobile
  assign toggles_gap = section.settings.toggles_gap  
  assign toggles_gap_mobile = section.settings.toggles_gap_mobile
  assign toggles_align = section.settings.toggles_align
  assign toggles_align_mobile = section.settings.toggles_align_mobile

  assign toggles_horizontal_align = ""
  if toggles_align == "center"
    assign toggles_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif toggles_align == "right"
    assign toggles_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign toggles_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign toggles_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if toggles_align_mobile == "center"
    assign toggles_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif toggles_align_mobile == "right"
    assign toggles_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign toggles_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign toggle_custom = section.settings.toggle_custom
  assign toggle_font = section.settings.toggle_font
  assign toggle_size = section.settings.toggle_size
  assign toggle_size_mobile = section.settings.toggle_size_mobile
  assign toggle_height = section.settings.toggle_height
  assign toggle_color = section.settings.toggle_color
  assign toggle_bg_color = section.settings.toggle_bg_color
  assign toggle_padding_horizontal = section.settings.toggle_padding_horizontal
  assign toggle_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.toggle_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign toggle_padding_vertical = section.settings.toggle_padding_vertical
  assign toggle_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.toggle_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign toggle_radius = section.settings.toggle_radius
  assign toggle_border_thickness = section.settings.toggle_border_thickness
  assign toggle_border_color = section.settings.toggle_border_color
  assign toggle_border_hover_color = section.settings.toggle_border_hover_color
  assign toggle_border_active_color = section.settings.toggle_border_active_color
  assign toggle_bg_hover_color = section.settings.toggle_bg_hover_color
  assign toggle_bg_active_color = section.settings.toggle_bg_active_color
  assign toggle_hover_color = section.settings.toggle_hover_color
  assign toggle_active_color = section.settings.toggle_active_color

  assign slides_mt = section.settings.slides_mt
  assign slides_mt_mobile = section.settings.slides_mt_mobile
  
  assign slide_layout = section.settings.slide_layout
  assign slide_layout_mobile = section.settings.slide_layout_mobile
  assign slide_gap = section.settings.slide_gap
  assign slide_gap_mobile = section.settings.slide_gap_mobile
  assign slide_content_align = section.settings.slide_content_align
  assign slide_content_align_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_align_mobile
  assign slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign slide_content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.slide_content_padding_horizontal
  assign slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign slide_content_padding_vertical = section.settings.slide_content_padding_vertical
  assign slide_border_thickness = section.settings.slide_border_thickness
  assign slide_border_color = section.settings.slide_border_color
  assign slide_bg_color = section.settings.slide_bg_color
  assign slide_radius = section.settings.slide_radius
  assign slide_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.slide_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign slide_padding_horizontal = section.settings.slide_padding_horizontal
  assign slide_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.slide_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign slide_padding_vertical = section.settings.slide_padding_vertical

  assign image_width = section.settings.image_width
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign slide_sub_heading_size = section.settings.slide_sub_heading_size
  assign slide_sub_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.slide_sub_heading_size_mobile
  assign slide_sub_heading_color = section.settings.slide_sub_heading_color
  assign slide_sub_heading_custom = section.settings.slide_sub_heading_custom
  assign slide_sub_heading_font = section.settings.slide_sub_heading_font
  assign slide_sub_heading_height = section.settings.slide_sub_heading_height

  assign slide_heading_size = section.settings.slide_heading_size
  assign slide_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.slide_heading_size_mobile
  assign slide_heading_color = section.settings.slide_heading_color
  assign slide_heading_custom = section.settings.slide_heading_custom
  assign slide_heading_font = section.settings.slide_heading_font
  assign slide_heading_height = section.settings.slide_heading_height
  assign slide_heading_mt = section.settings.slide_heading_mt
  assign slide_heading_mt_mobile = section.settings.slide_heading_mt_mobile

  assign slide_text_size = section.settings.slide_text_size
  assign slide_text_size_mobile = section.settings.slide_text_size_mobile
  assign slide_text_color = section.settings.slide_text_color
  assign slide_text_custom = section.settings.slide_text_custom
  assign slide_text_font = section.settings.slide_text_font
  assign slide_text_height = section.settings.slide_text_height
  assign slide_text_mt = section.settings.slide_text_mt
  assign slide_text_mt_mobile = section.settings.slide_text_mt_mobile

  assign progress_height = section.settings.progress_height
  assign progress_color = section.settings.progress_color
  assign progress_active_color = section.settings.progress_active_color

  assign use_autoplay = section.settings.use_autoplay
  assign autoplay = section.settings.autoplay
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  slide_sub_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  slide_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  slide_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  toggle_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .feature-toggles-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;   
    align-items: center;   
    justify-content: {{ toggles_horizontal_align_mobile }}; 
    margin-top: {{ toggles_mt_mobile }}px;
    gap: {{ toggles_gap_mobile }}px;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }
  
  .feature-toggles-{{ section.id }}::-webkit-scrollbar {
    display: none;
  }

  .feature-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    font-size: {{ toggle_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ toggle_color }};
    line-height: {{ toggle_height }}%;
    background-color: {{ toggle_bg_color }};
    padding: {{ toggle_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ toggle_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ toggle_border_thickness }}px solid {{ toggle_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ toggle_radius }}px;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    white-space: nowrap;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .feature-toggle-{{ section.id }}.active {
    background-color: {{ toggle_bg_active_color }};
    border: {{ toggle_border_thickness }}px solid {{ toggle_border_active_color }};
    color: {{ toggle_active_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .feature-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slides_mt_mobile }}px !important;
  }

  .feature-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex !important;
    height: auto !important;
    flex-direction: column !important;
    gap: {{ slide_gap_mobile }}px !important;
    padding: {{ slide_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ slide_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ slide_bg_color }};
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    align-items: stretch;
    border-radius: {{ slide_radius }}px;
    justify-content: space-between;
    border: {{ slide_border_thickness }}px solid {{ slide_border_color }} !important;
  }
  
  .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    grid-area: image;
    position: relative;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .feature-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
    grid-area: content;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex: 1 1 0;
    padding: {{ slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
  }

  .feature-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ slide_text_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .feature-slide-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ slide_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ slide_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ slide_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-wrap: wrap;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .feature-slide-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};  
  }

  .feature-slide-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ slide_sub_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ slide_sub_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ slide_sub_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-wrap: wrap;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .feature-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slide_heading_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};  
  }

  .feature-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ slide_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ slide_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ slide_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-wrap: wrap;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .feature-progress-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 5px;
    margin-top: 20px;
  }

  .feature-progress-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 1 1 0;
    position: relative;
    display: block !important;
    background-color: {{ progress_color }};
    height: {{ progress_height }}px;
    border-radius: 2px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .feature-progress-{{ section.id }}.active:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: {{ progress_active_color }};    
    border-radius: 2px;
  }

  .features-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .feature-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slides_mt }}px !important;
    }

    .feature-toggles-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      justify-content: {{ toggles_horizontal_align }}; 
      margin-top: {{ toggles_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ toggles_gap }}px;
      margin-left: 0rem;
      margin-right: 0rem;
      padding-left: 0rem;
      padding-right: 0rem;
    }

    .feature-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ toggle_size }}px;
      padding: {{ toggle_padding_vertical }}px {{ toggle_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

      
    .feature-toggle-{{ section.id }}:not(.active):hover {
      background-color: {{ toggle_bg_hover_color }};
      border: {{ toggle_border_thickness }}px solid {{ toggle_border_hover_color }};
      color: {{ toggle_hover_color }};
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .feature-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      display: grid !important;
      gap: {{ slide_gap }}px !important;
      padding: {{ slide_padding_vertical }}px {{ slide_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .feature-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      height: 100%;
      padding: {{ slide_content_padding_vertical }}px {{ slide_content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .feature-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slide_text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};
    }

    .feature-slide-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ slide_text_size }}px;
    }

    .feature-slide-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};  
    }

    .feature-slide-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ slide_sub_heading_size }}px;
    }

    .feature-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slide_heading_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};  
    }

    .feature-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ slide_heading_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if toggle_custom %}
  <style>
    .feature-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ toggle_font.family }}, {{ toggle_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ toggle_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ toggle_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_sub_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .feature-slide-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ slide_sub_heading_font.family }}, {{ slide_sub_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ slide_sub_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ slide_sub_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .feature-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ slide_heading_font.family }}, {{ slide_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ slide_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ slide_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .feature-slide-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ slide_text_font.family }}, {{ slide_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ slide_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ slide_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if use_autoplay %}
  <style>
  .feature-progress-{{ section.id }}.active:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: {{ progress_active_color }};
    -webkit-animation: ticker{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ autoplay }}s linear;
    animation: ticker{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ autoplay }}s linear;
    border-radius: 2px;
  }
  @keyframes ticker{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
    0% {
      transform: translateX(-100%);
    }
    100% {
      transform: translateX(0%);
    }
  }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_layout_mobile == 'image_content'%}
  <style>
    .feature-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 2;
    }

    .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 1;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif slide_layout_mobile == 'content_image' %}
  <style>
    .feature-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 1;
    }

    .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 2;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_layout == 'image_content'%}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-slide-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-areas: "image content";
        grid-template-columns: {% if image_width == 'narrow' %}40%{% elsif image_width == 'medium' %}50%{% else %}60%{% endif %} 1fr;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% elsif slide_layout == 'content_image' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-slide-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-areas: "content image";  
        grid-template-columns: 1fr {% if image_width == 'narrow' %}40%{% elsif image_width == 'medium' %}50%{% else %}60%{% endif %};     
      }
    }   
  </style>
{% endif %}
 
{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'heading' %}  
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          width: 100%;
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ block.settings.heading_align_mobile }};
        }
      
        .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          word-break: break-word;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          
          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ block.settings.heading_align }};
          }
        
          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }
        }          
      </style>
        
      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
    {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} feature-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% if block.type == 'heading' %}
          {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
            <div class="feature-heading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</div>
          {% endif %}   
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}
      <div class="feature-toggles-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'feature' %}
            <p class="feature-toggle-{{ section.id }} {% if forloop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.toggle }}</p>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>    
      <div class="feature-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
        <div class="features-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} swiper-wrapper">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% if block.type == 'feature' %}
              <div class="feature-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" data-id="{{ block.id }}">
                <div class="feature-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                    {%- liquid
                      if block.settings.image_mobile
                        assign sizes = "(min-width: 750px) 50vw, 100vw"
                      else
                        assign sizes = "100vw"
                      endif
                    -%}
                    {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                      loading: 'lazy',
                      width: block.settings.image.width,
                      height: block.settings.image.height,
                      sizes: sizes,
                      widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500',
                      alt: block.settings.image.alt | escape
                    }}                    
                  {% else %}
                    {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                  {% endif %} 
                </div>
                <div class="feature-slide-content-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="feature-slide-content-text-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.sub_heading != blank %}
                      <div class="feature-slide-subheading-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sub_heading }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                      <div class="feature-slide-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                      <div class="feature-slide-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>                 
                  <div class="feature-progress-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% for block in section.blocks %}
                      {% if block.type == 'feature' %}
                        <div class="feature-progress-{{ section.id }}" data-id="{{ block.id }}"></div>
                      {% endif %}                    
                    {% endfor %}
                  </div>                           
                </div>
              </div>
            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}
          
        </div>
      </div>     
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
function initFeature43() {
  const slider = new Swiper(".feature-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
    speed: 300,
    {% if use_autoplay %}
      autoplay: {
        delay: {{ autoplay }} * 1000,
        disableOnInteraction: false,
      },
    {% endif %}
    breakpoints: {
      320: { spaceBetween: 20, slidesPerView: 1 },
      768: { spaceBetween: 20, slidesPerView: 1 },
      1024: { spaceBetween: 20, slidesPerView: 1 }
    },
  });

  const toggles = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-toggle-{{ section.id }}');
  const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-slide-{{ section.id }}');

  toggles.forEach((toggle, i) => {
    toggle.addEventListener('click', function () {
      const toggleId = toggle.id;
      let slideIndex = Array.from(slides).findIndex(slide => slide.getAttribute('data-id') === toggleId);
      if (slideIndex !== -1) {
        slider.slideTo(slideIndex);
        setActive(slideIndex);
      }
    });
  });

  function setActive(index) {
    toggles.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
    if (toggles[index]) toggles[index].classList.add('active');
    slides.forEach((slide, slideIdx) => {
      const progresses = slide.querySelectorAll('.feature-progress-{{ section.id }}');

      progresses.forEach(p => {
        p.classList.remove('active');
        p.style.animation = 'none';
        p.offsetHeight;
        p.style.animation = null;
      });

      if (slideIdx === index) {
        if (progresses[index]) {
          progresses[index].classList.add('active');
        }
      }
    });
  }

  slider.on('slideChange', () => {
    const currentIndex = slider.realIndex;
    setActive(currentIndex);
  });

  setActive(slider.realIndex);
}



document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeature43);

if (Shopify.designMode) {
  document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeature43);
  document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeature43);
}
</script>

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
